DOC.criteria: Having obtain his/her parent ' ( his/her legally accept representative [ LAR 's ] write informed consent evidence personally sign date informed consent document indicate child 's parents/LAR inform pertinent aspect study Child born full term ( ≥ 37 week gestation ) Age enrollment : 11.5 month 13.5 month age 2.5 kg ≤ birth weight ≤ 4.5 kg Born singleton pregnancy Child 's parent ( ) /LAR legal age consent , sufficient local language skill complete inform consent study document , able contact directly telephone throughout study , willing able fulfill requirement study protocol . Diagnosed disorder consider interfere nutrition growth ( e.g . malabsorptive disorder short bowel syndrome , inflammatory bowel disease ; neurological congenital disorder may delay growth cerebral palsy , agenesis corpus callosum , spina bifida , Down Syndrome , Cri Du Chat ; disorder may lead obesity : Prader willi syndrome , Angelman syndrome , etc . ) Cows ' milk allergy Lactose intolerance Participation interventional clinical trial 4 week prior enrollment Infant breastfed time enrollment Infant usually drink 300ml cow 's and/or formula milk per day Institutionalized child Child child 's family Investigator 's judgment expect comply protocol study procedure
